mapper.select: SELECT mi_opponent_finance_id,market_insight_opponent_id,mi_opponent_choice_id,indicator_id,operate_year,operate_value,sort,delete_flag,create_by,create_time,update_by,update_time FROM mi_opponent_finance WHERE mi_opponent_finance_id=#{miOpponentFinanceId} and delete_flag=0

SELECT mi_opponent_finance_id,market_insight_opponent_id,mi_opponent_choice_id,indicator_id,operate_year,operate_value,sort,delete_flag,create_by,create_time,update_by,update_time FROM mi_opponent_finance WHERE mi_opponent_choice_id=#{miOpponentChoiceId} and delete_flag=0
mapper.update:
UPDATE mi_opponent_finance SET
market_insight_opponent_id=#{miOpponentFinance.marketInsightOpponentId},
mi_opponent_choice_id=#{miOpponentFinance.miOpponentChoiceId},
indicator_id=#{miOpponentFinance.indicatorId},
operate_year=#{miOpponentFinance.operateYear},
operate_value=#{miOpponentFinance.operateValue},
sort=#{miOpponentFinance.sort},
delete_flag=#{miOpponentFinance.deleteFlag},
create_by=#{miOpponentFinance.createBy},
create_time=#{miOpponentFinance.createTime},
update_by=#{miOpponentFinance.updateBy},
update_time=#{miOpponentFinance.updateTime}
WHERE mi_opponent_finance_id=#{miOpponentFinance.miOpponentFinanceId}

UPDATE mi_opponent_finance SET delete_flag= 1, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE mi_opponent_finance_id IN
#{item}
